articles.author: Peter Nicholas
articles.title: Trump's Criticism of Amazon: It's Personal
articles.description: President’s attacks on e-commerce company stem from its CEO’s ownership of the Washington Post, which the American leader says writes unfair stories about him, say people close to the White House.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: UPDATE 1-Trade war fears already hurting the economy, ECB's Coeure says
articles.description: Fears of a trade warfuelled by proposed U.S. tariffs are already raising borrowingcosts and pushing down share prices, a European Central Bankboard member said on Friday.

articles.title: Markets Cautiously Lower as US-China Trade Threat Looms
articles.description: The modest drop signals caution among investors as they await details from Trump’s latest threat to impose new tariffs on Chinese-made goods.

articles.title: China's HNA is looking to offload its $6.5 billion stake in Hilton
articles.description: HNA Group, which borrowed heavily in recent years to buy up assets around the world, is now seeking to sell its 26% stake in Hilton Worldwide.

articles.title: Virgin Galactic conducts first rocket-powered test since deadly 2014 accident
articles.description: Virgin Galactic's SpaceShipTwo fired up its rocket-powered motor for the first time Thursday during a flight test in Mojave. The spaceplane was airborne for more than an hour before landing.

articles.title: Target to Pay $3.7 Million in Settlement Over Job-Screening Policies
articles.description: Target has agreed to pay more than $3.7 million and overhaul job-screening guidelines for hourly workers to resolve a civil-rights class-action complaint that alleged the company’s policies regarding criminal-background checks were too broad and discriminated…

articles.author: Doug Cameron
articles.title: Delta Says Hack on Vendor Exposed Customer Credit-Card Data
articles.description: Delta Air Lines Inc. on Thursday said hundreds of thousands of customers could have had their credit-card information compromised in a cyberattack on a vendor that ran a chat function on the carrier’s website.

articles.title: Bitcoin exchange Coinbase launches early-stage venture fund
articles.description: Popular cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase is launching a vehicle for early-stage investments, the company announced Thursday.

articles.title: J&J, Imerys must pay $37 million in case over talc cancer risks: jury
articles.description: Johnson & Johnson (JNJ.N) suffered its first trial loss in a lawsuit claiming its talc-based products including Johnson's Baby Powder contain cancer-causing asbestos, with a New Jersey jury on Thursday ordering J&J and another company to pay $37 million in da…

articles.description: The filing deadline for 2017 taxes is near. Heres how to get an extension, what to do if you cant pay and answers to 11 common questions.

articles.title: Dog Dies After Grooming At Toms River PetSmart
articles.description: Chuck Crawfords corgi, Abby, is the third dog whose death is blamed on PetSmart grooming in 4 months; hes urging people to use their vets.

articles.title: US trade deficit rises to near nine-and-a-half-year high in February
articles.description: The U.S. trade deficit increased to a near 9-1/2-year high in February, with both imports and exports rising to record highs in a sign of strong domestic and global demand.
